name: PJ Web Solutions Ltd
description:
PJ Web Solutions are software specialists that have been developing bespoke content managed websites and web based back office systems since their inception in 1999. They are a small, closely knit team of experienced professionals who all share the same keen eye for detail, customer focus and passion for their work.
Their expertise lies within our ability digest complex requirements / briefs and develop tailored solutions that not only meet but exceed client expectations.
